name: Vinhomes Metropolis VR Interior
description:
This is an experience where we expect you to spend about 5 minutes.
It is a pilot/test that we will support/update until December 2018

Put on your VR headset and prepare to explore our penhouse in full 3D.
Enjoy walking around and interacting with some parts of it just like you were there.
Instantly change the look and feel of the room by selecting a different material finish.
Try our “teleport” or “walk” function.
